resources.string: A computation error in FFT has occurred

Percentage worse case frequencies shows the most prominent frequencies in a recording. Ratio background noise frequencies shows the frequencies which are signficantly greater than the background noise level but lesser than percentage worse case frequencies. These are the frequencies recorded when there is a lot of background noise along with the hum, for example, during daytime.
X axis : Frequency in Hz, Y axis : Magnitude. A sharp peak at a particular frequency means that the signal is of that frequency.
